title: LeagueClientUxRender problem
body:
My client is freezing when I log in. I can still click things but the display is frozen. I discovered a temporary fix. When I click play, the process "LeagueClientUxRender" takes up a large portion of CPU. When I end the process the client will refresh and things will work as normal. What is causing this? I am on Windows 7. I have tried the full repair on the log-in screen and I have tried redownloading league as well.

P.S. I googled this and found https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/VqaX7t7H-what-is-leagueclientuxrenderexe

There was no solution posted in that post unfortunately...

replies.body: Your client might be going through a lot of stress and struggling to load properly.  Closing the LeagueClientUxRender would just close the client and then reboot it.  Enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode could help as well as Close Client During game.  Let me know if that helps!
